text:
on line 95, the sed statement:

CFLAGS="$RPM_OPT_FLAGS `pkg-config --cflags openssl | sed 's/ *$//'`"


needs to be


CFLAGS="$RPM_OPT_FLAGS `pkg-config --cflags openssl | sed 's/ *$//;s/  / /g'`"


Owing to differences in pkgtool output.  I had reported this some years ago on build 2.0.2x something, but I didn't see it in the history.

To reproduce on Mandriva:

put the src tarball in /usr/src/RPM/SOURCE and the spec file in /usr/src/RPM/SPEC.

run rpmbuild -ba SPEC/httpd.spec

It will fail to build when configure tried to compare the old and new versions of the cached environment args.
